attributes.action: End the suffering of those in Palestine from Israeli aggression.   Israeli's deserve freedom, peace and the right to have their own state, yes, but SO DO PALESTINIANS. Stop the apartheid being practiced in the occupied regions where Palestinians are second class citizens in their own home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please call an end to the human rights disaster which is the illegal Israeli occupation of Palestine. In the name of the defence of Israel the occupation forces impose mass punishment on the people of the West Bank and the Gaza Strip. This involves road blocks restricting the movement of all vehicles including ambulances and fire engines, curfews lasting months, destruction of property and the murder of innocents. The UN has done nothing, America funds it and this issue is one of the primary causes of tension between the West and the Middle East. Stop it now. Stop all Israeli aggression against Palestine.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
